faqs.question: How do I track my grievance?
faqs.answer: You can track your grievance using the tracking ID provided after submission. Our real-time tracking system provides updates at every stage.

faqs.question: What happens after I submit a grievance?
faqs.answer: Your grievance is analyzed by our AI system, categorized by priority, and assigned to the relevant department. You'll receive regular updates via SMS/email.

faqs.question: How long does resolution take?
faqs.answer: Resolution time varies by type of grievance. Simple issues are typically resolved within 48 hours, while complex cases may take 7-14 days.

faqs.question: Can I submit anonymous complaints?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can submit anonymous complaints. However, we recommend providing contact details for better follow-up and updates.
